content: How do I check my transaction fees on Acme DeFi?
reply: Error generating reply: 404 models/gemini-1.5-flash is not found for API version v1beta, or is not supported for generateContent. Call ListModels to see the list of available models and their supported methods.

content: How do I check my transaction fees on Acme DeFi?
reply: Hey there! You'll see estimated transaction fees (gas costs) displayed *before* confirming any action on Acme DeFi. For completed transactions, you can always check the exact fees on the blockchain explorer using your transaction hash. Need a quick guide to that?
